mapper.insert:
insert into person
id,
name,
number,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
status,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update person
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
